project_plan.name: Random Password Generator in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python script that generates random passwords with specified requirements.

task.name: Implement password generation logic that includes uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters.
Add functionality to allow the user to configure the length of the password.
Write tests to validate the functionality of password generation and length configuration.
Execute tests to ensure that the password generation works correctly and meets requirements.
